name: Sweet Bubble Shooter Mania
description:
Sweet Bubble Shooter Mania is an extremely addictive game that any mobile user should have in their library of apps.

"The most polished bubble popper to date."

The best bubble puzzle adventure game!

Throw bubbles and match colors to pop and drop your way to victory!


Shoot the colored bubbles to make clusters of three or more same colored bubbles to pop them out of the screen to clear the screen.

Bubbles Shooter! is a very classical games. You will find lots fun to play it!
